00013 MakeDetectorPulses::MakeDetectorPulses(modules::options* opts):
00014     BaseModule("MakeDetectorPulses",opts,false),fOptions(opts){
00015         // Get the algorithm option from the modules file
00016         // If nothing was set, use MaxTimeDiff by default
00017         fAlgorithm=opts->GetString("default_algorithm","MaxTimeDiff");
00018         fPassThruName=opts->GetString("pass_through_algorithm","PassThrough");
00019     }

00023 
00024 int MakeDetectorPulses::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData, const TSetupData* setup){
00025     // Set up the generator
00026     TDPGeneratorOptions gen_opts("gen opts",fOptions);
00027     fGenerator=MakeGenerator(fAlgorithm,&gen_opts);
00028     fPassThruGenerator=MakeGenerator(fPassThruName,&gen_opts);
00029     if(!fGenerator) return 1;
00030 
00031     const IDs::channel* ch;
00032     const IDs::generator* gen;
00033     IDs::source partner;
00034     IDs::source tdp_source;
00035     // Find all fast detectors
00036     TVDetectorPulseGenerator* generator;
00037     for (SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator i_source = gAnalysedPulseMap.begin();
00038             i_source != gAnalysedPulseMap.end(); i_source++) {
00039         ch=&i_source->first.Channel();
00040         gen=&i_source->first.Generator();
00041 
00042         // Find the correct source since the generator options could be different
00043         for (SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator j_source = gAnalysedPulseMap.begin();
00044              j_source != gAnalysedPulseMap.end(); ++j_source) {
00045           
00046           if (j_source->first.Generator().Type() == gen->Type()
00047               && j_source->first.Channel() == ch->GetCorrespondingFastSlow()) {
00048             partner = j_source->first;
00049           }
00050         }
00051         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count(partner)==0) partner=i_source->first;
00052 
00053         // if there is no corresponding fast / slow channel then use the pass
00054         // through generator
00055         if(partner==i_source->first) {
00056             generator=fPassThruGenerator;
00057         } else {
00058             generator=fGenerator;
00059         }
00060 
00061         // Prepare the source ID for the TDP generator
00062         tdp_source=i_source->first;
00063         tdp_source.Channel().SlowFast(IDs::kNotApplicable);
00064         tdp_source.Generator()=generator->GetGeneratorID();
00065 
00066         if(ch->isFast()) {
00067             // fast channels go first
00068             fFastSlowPairs.insert(Detector_t(tdp_source, i_source->first,partner,generator));
00069         }else{ 
00070             // slow channels go second
00071             // if both fast and slow are the same then later there will be
00072             // nothing to do.
00073             fFastSlowPairs.insert(Detector_t(tdp_source, partner,i_source->first,generator));
00074         }
00075     }
00076 
00077     // setup gDetectorPulseMap to contain all pulse lists for each TDP source
00078     for( ChannelPairing_t::iterator i=fFastSlowPairs.begin();i!=fFastSlowPairs.end();i++){
00079         gDetectorPulseMap[i->source];
00080         if(Debug()){
00081             std::cout<<"Paired: "<<i->fast<<" with "<<i->slow<<" processed by: "<<i->generator->GetGeneratorID()<<std::endl;
00082         }
00083     }
00084     return 0;
00085 }
00086 
00087 int MakeDetectorPulses::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, const TSetupData* gSetup){
00088     IDs::channel detector(IDs::kAnyDetector,IDs::kNotApplicable);
00089     IDs::source source;
00090     const AnalysedPulseList *slow_pulses;
00091     const AnalysedPulseList *fast_pulses;
00092     SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator current;
00093     //DetectorPulseList *detectorPulses;
00094 
00095     // Loop through paired channels
00096     for (ChannelPairing_t::const_iterator i_detector = fFastSlowPairs.begin();
00097             i_detector != fFastSlowPairs.end(); i_detector++) {
00098         detector=i_detector->fast.Channel();
00099 
00100         // find the list of analyzed pulses for the fast channel
00101         current=gAnalysedPulseMap.find(i_detector->fast);
00102         if(current==gAnalysedPulseMap.end()){
00103             std::cout<<"Unable to find source for fast channel: "<<i_detector->fast<<std::endl;
00104             DumpgAnalysedPulseMap(gAnalysedPulseMap);
00105             return 1;
00106         }
00107         fast_pulses=&(current->second);
00108 
00109         // check if the fast_pulses is empty
00110         if(fast_pulses->empty()) {
00111             if(Debug()) cout<< "List of TAPs for "<<i_detector->fast<<" is empty."<<endl;
00112             continue;
00113         }
00114 
00115         // if the fast and slow sources are the same then pass the slow channel
00116         // as NULL
00117         if(i_detector->fast==i_detector->slow) slow_pulses=NULL;
00118         else{
00119             current=gAnalysedPulseMap.find(i_detector->slow);
00120             if(current==gAnalysedPulseMap.end()){
00121                 std::cout<<"Unable to find source for slow channel: "<<i_detector->slow<<std::endl;
00122                 DumpgAnalysedPulseMap(gAnalysedPulseMap);
00123                 return 1;
00124             }
00125             slow_pulses=&(current->second);
00126             // check if the fast_pulses is empty
00127             if(slow_pulses->empty()) {
00128                 if(Debug())
00129                 cout<< "List of TAPs for "<<i_detector->slow<<" is empty."<<endl;
00130                 continue;
00131             }
00132         }
00133 
00134         // Set the channel
00135         i_detector->generator->SetChannel(detector);
00136         // Set the pulse lists
00137         i_detector->generator->SetPulseLists(fast_pulses,slow_pulses);
00138         // Process the pulses
00139         source=i_detector->source;
00140         i_detector->generator->ProcessPulses(gDetectorPulseMap.at(source));
00141     }
00142     return 0;
00143 }
00144 
00145 TVDetectorPulseGenerator* MakeDetectorPulses::MakeGenerator(const std::string& generatorType, TDPGeneratorOptions* opts ){
00146     // Select the generator type
00147     TVDetectorPulseGenerator* generator=TDPGeneratorFactory::Instance()->createModule(generatorType,opts);
00148     if (!generator){
00149         return NULL;
00150     }
00151     // setup some options on the generator
00152     generator->SetDebug(Debug());
00153     return generator;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void MakeDetectorPulses::DumpgAnalysedPulseMap(const SourceAnalPulseMap& aMap){
00157     std::cout<<"gAnalysedPulseMap contains:"<<std::endl;
00158     for(SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator it=aMap.begin();
00159             it!=aMap.end(); it++){
00160         cout<<it->first<<" contains "<<it->second.size()<<" TAPs"<<endl;
00161     }
00162 
00163 }
